name: 96 beats per minute
description:
Made in 72 hours for Ludum Dare 51.

The theme was "Every 10 seconds".

At 96 beats per minute, 16 beats fit exactly within 10 seconds.

Credits
  • Font: Quicksand by Andrew Paglinawan
  • Kick drum and rimshot samples by Dustyroom
  • Laser beam sound ripped from Sleepy Snow tracker mod by drozerix
